about_the_game:
Take your first step into the world of photography!

There’s no better way to start your journey as a photographer than simply taking pictures. Visit the wild land of Norwegian island for breathtaking views, perfect for the beginning of your great adventure with a camera.

Take your first steps into the world of professional photography - learn how to set a camera and frame a picture to get the best photo. Capture the beauty of flora and fauna, but be careful! You have to put your stealth skills to work not to scare timid animals away. Complete tasks, get the highest scores and better gear to improve your work.

Play Wildlife Prologue to learn the basics of photography or practice your skills before entering the bigger world of Photography Simulator.
detailed_description:
Take your first step into the world of photography!

There’s no better way to start your journey as a photographer than simply taking pictures. Visit the wild land of Norwegian island for breathtaking views, perfect for the beginning of your great adventure with a camera.

Take your first steps into the world of professional photography - learn how to set a camera and frame a picture to get the best photo. Capture the beauty of flora and fauna, but be careful! You have to put your stealth skills to work not to scare timid animals away. Complete tasks, get the highest scores and better gear to improve your work.

Play Wildlife Prologue to learn the basics of photography or practice your skills before entering the bigger world of Photography Simulator.
name: Photography Simulator Wildlife Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 with updates
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600X, Intel Core i7-6800K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700, NVIDIA GeForce 1070 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 with updates
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600X, Intel i5-10600K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 6800 XT, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Required

short_description: Begin your journey with professional photography. Learn new skills or polish old ones while trying to hunt and shoot the best pictures. Prepare for greater adventure with Wildlife Prologue.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support
